line.originaltext: 1 cup corn
1/2 cup diced red onion
1 cup peeled, chopped jicama
1/2 cup diced red bell pepper
1 cup fresh cilantro leaves, finely chopped
1 lime, zested and juiced
2 tablespoons sour cream
2 tablespoons cayenne pepper
1 tablespoon ground black pepper
2 tablespoons salt
6 (4 ounce) fillets tilapia
2 tablespoons olive oil
12 corn tortillas, warmed
Preheat grill for high heat.
Preheat grill for high heat.
In a medium bowl, mix together corn, red onion, jicama, red bell pepper, and cilantro.
In a medium bowl, mix together corn, red onion, jicama, red bell pepper, and cilantro.
line.annotation: combine({ing16, ing17, ing18, ing19, ing20}, ing29, "veggies", "")

line.originaltext: In a medium bowl, mix together corn, red onion, jicama, red bell pepper, and cilantro.
Stir in lime juice and zest.
Stir in lime juice and zest.
In a small bowl, combine cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, and salt.
In a small bowl, combine cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, and salt.
In a small bowl, combine cayenne pepper, ground black pepper, and salt.
Brush each fillet with olive oil, and sprinkle with spices.
line.annotation: combine({ing26, ing27}, ing35, "oiled fillets", "brush each filet with olive oil")

line.originaltext: Brush each fillet with olive oil, and sprinkle with spices.
line.annotation: combine({ing34, ing35}, ing36, "seasoned filets", "sprinkle with spices")

line.originaltext: Arrange fillets on grill grate, and cook for 3 minutes per side.
Arrange fillets on grill grate, and cook for 3 minutes per side.
line.annotation: cook(ing36, t2, ing37, "cooked fillets", "3 minutes per side")

line.originaltext: For each fiery fish taco, top two corn tortillas with fish, sour cream, and corn salsa.
line.annotation: combine({ing22, ing28, ing32, ing37}, ing38, "finished taco", "top torillas with other ingredients")

line.originaltext: For each fiery fish taco, top two corn tortillas with fish, sour cream, and corn salsa.
